means: （政党内）路线偏差（指"左"倾或右倾）分子（的）

sentence.Network_en: This will lead to Right deviationist mistakes.
This likelihood exists for that section of the student body with Right deviationist ideas.
sentence.Network_cn: 有一部分有右倾思想的学生,有此可能.

sentence.Network_en: The mistakes he has made this time are Right deviationist and empiricist in nature.
sentence.Network_cn: 他这一次所犯的错误,性质属于右倾的错误,属于经验主义性质的错误.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 美国大学翻译中文32 - DuSystem Forum... ... 异端 heterodoxy 异端分子 deviationist 异端裁判所 inquisition.
...者转向了异端的（heretical）的虔敬观，成为异议分子（deviationist）。
或者，用一个时髦词，是异议分子的（deviationist）。这一点从以下的思考很容易看出。
deviationismdeviationist 离经叛道者deviate from 违背偏离device 设备设置装置装备器械仪器诡计设计计.

list.abs: This will lead to Right deviationist mistakes ., 这就要犯右倾的错误.
besides , there were the Right deviationist errors committed by Chang Kuo-tao , Kao Kang and others .此外，还有张国焘、高岗等人的右倾错误。

means.word_mean: 1. an ideological defector from the party line (especially from orthodox communism)
